identity: John Lin is a 25-year-old easy-going, confident, and competitive pharmacist who prioritizes his family and has a strong morning routine. He is married to Mei Lin and has a young son named Eddy, who are currently on vacation in Alfter near Bonn, Germany. John is dedicated to his work at Willows Market and Pharmacy, where he is well-liked by the community for his expertise and friendly demeanor. When not working or spending time with family, he unwinds after work by taking a walk or doing some exercise.
